channel.title: Laugh In on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Laugh In on My New Hugo Site

item.title: His Name Was Larry
item.description: [whitebox] Editor’s note: Hey all, Ernie here with another piece from David Buck, who wrote his first Tedium piece on outsider icon R. Stevie Moore. Turns out his knowledge of outsider artists goes deep—as you’ll see with today’s piece. [big]Today in Tedium: “I’ve got a camera, loaded with film,” he sang, “I’m gonna take a picture of you.” I became particularly fascinated with the unique vocal stylings of Larry “Wild Man” Fischer after hearing his song “I Got a Camera” on a warm summer day, just before my freshman year of high school.
